description:
This next door neighbor, PJ, is a 28 year old financial advisor at a bank.
His muscular physique and handsome good looks made him a natural choice for a next door male. We ran into PJ at the gym, where one of our scouts saw him working out his ripped back.
She approached him and asked if he was into fitness and health. It was obvious enough, given how he fills out his shirt with his huge pecs and arms, so it was no surprise when he jumped into how he does some in-home personal training for a few 'special' clients. Our scout handed him one of our cards, and next thing you know, he's in our studio showing us just how worked out his body is.
So enjoy PJ as he kicks back after a long day behind the desk and pays a little attention to his personal needs.
title: PJ
